name: Kill the ball
description:
Kill the ball

Control:

- key arrow to the right and left - move the platform to the right and to the left

- key 'space' - fire

- M - menu open

- P - pause

- R - restart the room

All other moves with the mouse

Game description:

there are flying balls in the room that u have to destroy. If the ball touches the platform it takes life away. Balls can stick to the platform so be carefull!

Balls change the color from purple to red. How closer is the color to red, how faster the ball is.

There is no music since in such games people turn it off anyway.

P.S. Enjoy the game!
